thread.title: Country Music Mega Star Jason Aldean Is Selling His Badass Tennessee Hunting Property For A Cool $4.6 Million
thread.title_full: Country Music Mega Star Jason Aldean Is Selling His Badass Tennessee Hunting Property For A Cool $4.6 Million

author: Cass Anderson
title: Country Music Mega Star Jason Aldean Is Selling His Badass Tennessee Hunting Property For A Cool $4.6 Million
text:
Via Black Jack Ridge 

Since his debut in 2005, Country Music superstar Jason Aldean has had 18 singles reach #1 on the Country Music charts, and another 8 singles hit the top 10. His 2010 album is certified as going quadruple-platinum, 2012 album double-platinum, and Jason’s 2016 album has already gone single platinum. That’s a shit ton of records being sold by Jason Aldean , and that leads to a whole lot of coin landing in Jason’s bank account.
One of the major purchases Jason’s made during his ascent to Country Music superstardom is a 1,436-acre hunting property in Centerville, Tennessee. The property, known as Black Jack Ridge, is littered with streams for fishing and big ol’ bucks for hunting . For years, Black Jack Ridge has been a respite for Jason Aldean when he wants to get away from Nashville and the life of a Country Music celebrity, but Jason’s put his hunting property on the market for a cool $4,599,000 .
The hunting shack built on Black Jack Ridge is everything you’d ever want when purchasing a sprawling estate built primarily for spending time in the great outdoors :
Via Black Jack Ridge 

Via Black Jack Ridge 

Via Black Jack Ridge

Via Black Jack Ridge 

The cabin on Black Jack Ridge features 6 bedrooms, 5.5 bathrooms, and a 3 bay garage. You can see all sorts of photographs and information about this property on the Black Jack Ridge website where it’s listed at $4,599,000.
(Shout out to OutdoorHub for sharing this news story!)
